Title: Something Like Family
Description:
Grab a bite! Scaralesh's Special! If you're a hungry dracthyr in need of cheer, this is the place!

<Scaralesh lowers his voice to talk to you.>

Between you and me, $n? Our people have been through a lot lately. We need something to help us relax, and remind us that we've always got each other. I think a family meal could be just that.

Rommen and I can handle the cooking. Will you bring plates to dracthyr who need a warm bite to eat?
ObjectivesText: Bring plates of food to dracthyr at the party in Weyrnrest.

Objectives.Text: Feast brought to table of newcomers
